pages.text: The $(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/farmers-delight-refabricated)Farmer's Delight Refabricated$() mod adds a lot of new farming and cooking methods to the game. You can grow a variety of new crops and cook them into delicious meals. Use the crafting helper in your inventory to check out all the Farmer's Delight meals you can make using "@farmers" in the searchbar.

pages.title: Crops & Meals
pages.text: Example of some of the new crops you can grow and foods you can make. Sandwiches are a good and easy way to get a lot of food in one item. I personally recommend the egg sandwich :D.

$(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/brewin-and-chewin)Brewin' and Chewin'$() adds alcohol and cheese products to the game. You can brew beer, wine and cider and make cheese from milk. The mod also adds a lot of new food items and meals to the game. Use the crafting helper in your inventory to check out all the Brewin' and Chewin' meals you can make using "@brewin" in the searchbar.
